data.title: Wigand Salmuth Age, Birthday, Zodiac Sign and Birth Chart
data.meta_description: Astrology details of Wigand Salmuth such as age, birthday, zodiac sign, and natal chart. Analyze their birth chart and kundli to understand their personality and cause of death through astrology.
data.text:
Kurt Wigand Freiherr von Salmuth was a German industrialist born on January 22, 1931, in Leipzig. He was a significant figure in the Röchling Group, where he served as managing partner. His career included roles at Gebrüder Giulini GmbH and as chairman of the supervisory board of Rheinmetall AG. Salmuth was dedicated to the restoration of the Thomaskirche and its choir. He was married for 45 years and had four children. He passed away on December 10, 2006, in Heidelberg.
